posts.title: Hello World!
posts.teaser: I’ve finally started a blog! For those of you that don’t know me, my name is Bryce and I have worked in the digital marketing industry for the last 10(ish) years...
posts.content:
I’ve finally started a blog! For those of you that don’t know me, my name is Bryce and I have worked in the digital marketing industry for the last 10(ish) years. I’ve spent the majority of this time as a web project manager. I’ve also worked on a few web design/development freelance projects outside of my professional roles.

I’m a productivity nerd, music lover and recent comic book enthusiest. I live in Medford MA with my wife and two children dogs.

I am currently attending a school called Hack Reactor that focuses on full-stack javascript development, and will be taking on freelance development projects starting May 2017.

I’ll be using this blog to share my thoughts on digital marketing, software engineering, project management and productivity (and other random things).
